data.message: Eminem just keeps getting better in my eyes- he says it like it is "the truth" always has ❤. Im from the UK and i can see Trump is just some guy on a major powertrip who will spit his dummy out when he dont get his own way. P.S cant wait to hear some stuff from Boogie XX
